column4: hi, i just installed the latest iso on a laptop, and i want to stress the shit out of it like running stress (that apt cant find) or some variant of 3dmark that windows offers
thers benchmark apps in teh repos.. or at some web sites ive seen.
one way. rename /etc/grub.d/30_os-prober to be a lower #. like 09_os-prober
the grub2 docs mention other ways
